divs: Sighting DetailsUFO above building across the street from my house..glowing in yellow thing on building...Big owl on left hand side of UFO..maybe 60ft high with 100ft wing span...2-3 other UFO in the far right of picture..and faintly in the dead center of photograph...a mile wide UFO...you can hardly see it but it there...also there are 2 white large orbs with faces on them...felt like taking a picture here and i did....I have a lot of pictures and more are coming..there a lot on my space.
